excerpt: "With these six pitchers, there’s more than one thing that speaks in their favor. None of them is lower than sixth on their starting pitcher depth charts, and all of them have at least one good out pitch, and at least one pitch they can command. They’re all cheap. That’s enough to take a chance on them."
